name: DateTimePicker
description: Date and Time Picker Component that wraps RNDateTimePicker for date and time modes. See: https://github.com/react-native-community/react-native-datetimepicker#react-native-datetimepicker
note: DateTimePicker uses a native library. You MUST add and link the native library to both iOS and Android projects

props.name: mode
props.description: The type of picker to display ('date' or 'time')

props.name: value
props.description: The initial value to set the picker to
props.note: Defaults to device's date and time

props.name: editable
props.description: Should this input be editable or disabled

props.name: minimumDate
props.description: The minimum date or time value to use

props.name: maximumDate
props.description: The maximum date or time value to use

props.name: dateFormat
props.description: The date format for the text display

props.name: dateFormatter
props.description: A callback function to format date

props.name: timeFormat
props.description: The time format for the text display

props.name: timeFormatter
props.description: A callback function to format time

props.name: locale
props.description: Allows changing of the locale of the component

props.name: is24Hour
props.description: Allows changing of the time picker to a 24 hour format

props.name: minuteInterval
props.description: The interval at which minutes can be selected. Possible values are: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 10, 12, 15, 20, 30

props.name: timeZoneOffsetInMinutes
props.description: Allows changing of the timeZone of the date picker. By default it uses the device's time zone

props.name: dialogProps
props.description: Props to pass the Dialog component

props.name: headerStyle
props.description: Style to apply to the iOS dialog header

props.name: themeVariant
props.description: Override system theme variant (dark or light mode) used by the date picker
